ViewTransitionFinished.summary:
The finished read-only property of the
interface is a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills once the transition animation is finished, and the new page view is visible and interactive to the user.

remarks.para: finished only rejects if the callback passed to throws or returns a promise that rejects, which indicates that the new state of the page wasn't created.
If a transition animation fails to start, or is skipped during the animation using , the end state is still reached therefore finished still fulfills.
-Smooth and simple transitions with the View Transitions API
